lines.text: Will somebody just listen for a second! I can't do this!
Why not?
It's absolutely crucial that I devote every day to my career!
Well, have you got a letter from your employer?
I could get a note from my mother.

I still remember her first words to me. I was 5, she was 11, I walked into the girls bathroom while she was getting undressed. She said "get out of here, you little pervert!" God, she was sophisticated. It took me years to figure out what that meant.
Donald had thrown her out, I'd moved in. She was out for blood!
Out for blood, YOU tried to run me down, Honey!
I used to worry about my kids if they came home late at night. But today, as I saw my eldest son on the news exposed as a common criminal, I felt nothing.
Don't you see, mom, I've cracked the case!
You're just plain cracked, Richard!
Sit down!
In my house, I'll sit when I'm good and ready!
Kids a good target, though. He's gonna go far.
Yeah, but he just might have to get towed the whole way.
You look quite attractive without your glasses. Here, put them back on.
The Murderess!
Attempted!
Wait a second! You're not the little pervert from the girl's bathroom?
Yes! You remember me!
Hey, cut that out, kid, why'd you do that?
You said he was a pervert!
Oh we were just reminiscing...
